main.name: Angela "Zi Lan" Zhang
main.description: I am a student-athlete at Columbia University (grad May 2024) who is passionate about making cool apps and services
main.bio: I am a recruited Divison I Athlete and program record-holder who brings her passion and discipline from the golf course to her work in software engineering.
main.contactmessage: If you wish to contact me, please fill out and submit the following form.

resume.skillmessage: A short write-up of my skills:

education.description:
• Transferred to and Recruited by Columbia to Play Div I Golf Following Dartmouth's Golf Team Elimination
• Resuming Computer Science Degree Studies at Columbia College

• 3.85/4.00 GPA, Honors Roll Recipient
• Recruited Division I Athlete
• All-Time School Program Record Holder for Women’s Golf

work.title: Software Engineer Dev I Intern
work.description:
• Promoted to a college junior level internship despite having applied for a sophomore position
• Designed, coded, and tested an asynchronous code artifact layer merging system for serverless functions
• Given a return offer for Summer 2022

work.title: Fullstack Engineer
work.description:
• Admitted as one of the youngest members to Dartmouth's tech-entrepreneurial program after a rigorous selection process
• Worked part-time to create full-stack web apps for companies in teams of designers, engineers, PMs

work.title: Computer Science and Maths T.A. and Tutor
work.description:
• As a TA, led weekly coding sessions for students, grading and reviewing their code and homework
• As a tutor, helped 5 assigned peers to achieve 90%+ in Calculus and Python classes in a 1:1 setting

projects.title: Pine Beetle Prediction Tool
projects.description: interactive pine beetle infestation visualization and prediction

projects.title: A Train Away
projects.description: an immersive story-telling experience in VR

projects.title: To-do List
projects.description: a to-do list web app deployed with MongoDB cloud database to Heroku

projects.title: Food Products Quality Classifier
projects.description: predicts the quality of an Amazon food product based on reviews, F1=0.87

projects.title: Simon Says Game
projects.description: a fun JavaScript game inspired by Simon Says

projects.title: Meme Sharing Tool
projects.description: an API tool leveraging Reddit upvote system and Twitter for optimal meme sharing
